actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make payments to producers of the 1980 crop of soybeans for losses caused by natural disasters.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to make payments to the producers of the 1980 crop of soybeans if such producer is able to harvest less than 70 percent of such crop because of a natural disaster. Establishes a formula for determining the amount of such payments.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to make payments to producers of the 1980 crop of soybeans for losses caused by natural disasters.
